testcase.brief: Match-map is to network Platform Dependence BR100,BR200,BR200-WP,BRAP330,BRAP350,BRAP121,BRAP141
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: 1. Set interface wifi1 mode wan 2. Establish a tunnel between BR eth0 and CVG 3. Eth0 is the defaut interface on main route table
Test Procedure: 1. Set a match-map from any to network 2. Set a route-map, all traffic via tunnel interface on eth0 3. Bind one match-map to routing policy 4. Laptop connect to BR, Laptop send traffic to the network, check result1 5. Laptop send traffic to not the network, check result2

step.desc: config mgt0.1 and mgt0.2 with dhcp service enable,dns service enable
step.telnet: -v "vlan ${br1.vpc1.vlan}" -v "interface vlan ${br1.vpc1.vlan}" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} ip ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}/${br.lan.netmask}" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} dhcp-server ip-pool ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_start} ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_end}" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} dhcp-server options netmask 255.255.255.0" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} dhcp-server options default-gateway ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} dhcp-server options dns1 ${pub.dns1.ip}" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} dhcp-server enable"

-v "interface ${br1.br.lan.int1} switchport mode access" -v "interface ${br1.br.lan.int1} switchport access vlan ${br1.vlan1} " -v "interface ${br1.br.lan.int1} switchport user-profile-attribute 1" -v "user-profile fw qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${br1.vlan1} attribute 1"

step.desc: Set interface wifi0 mode wan Set a match-map from any to network Set a route-map, all traffic via tunnel interface on eth0 Bind one match-map to routing policy
step.telnet: -v "routing match-map ma iif ${br1.br.lan.int1} to network ${cvg1.vpc1.tif.subnet}/24" -v "routing route-map ra via encrypted" -v "routing route-map ra via ${br1.br.wan.int1}" -v "routing policy pa id 1 match-map ma route-map ra"

step.desc: Laptop connect to the BR eth1 interface
set br1.vpc1.tif.ip var for vpc1 on BR side

step.telnet: -v "_ff id 1 src-ip ${br1.vpc1.tif.ip} bidirectional" -v "_kdebug fe basic" -v "_kdebug fe detail" -v "clear log buffered"

step.desc: Laptop send traffic to vpn network,ping is successful
show logging buffered on br ,ping traffic is forwarded on tunnel ,match the routing policy
Laptop send traffic to internet,ping is successful
show logging buffered on br ,ping traffic is forwarded on wan interface base on the main route table
